name: sw4

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: This package builds SW4 with MPI, OpenMP, HDF5, FFTW, PROJ, and ZFP.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description:
CLBlast is a modern, lightweight, performant and tunable OpenCL BLAS
library written in C++11. It is designed to leverage the full
performance potential of a wide variety of OpenCL devices from different
vendors, including desktop and laptop GPUs, embedded GPUs, and other
accelerators. CLBlast implements BLAS routines: basic linear algebra
subprograms operating on vectors and matrices.

dependencies.name: fftw
dependencies.description:
FFTW is a C subroutine library for computing the discrete Fourier
transform (DFT) in one or more dimensions, of arbitrary input size, and
of both real and complex data (as well as of even/odd data, i.e. the
discrete cosine/sine transforms or DCT/DST). We believe that FFTW, which
is free software, should become the FFT library of choice for most
applications.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: h5z-zfp
dependencies.description:
A highly flexible floating point and integer compression plugin for the
HDF5 library using ZFP compression.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:
The Cray Scientific Libraries package, LibSci, is a collection of
numerical routines optimized for best performance on Cray systems.

dependencies.name: llvm-openmp
dependencies.description:
The OpenMP subproject of LLVM contains the components required to build
an executable OpenMP program that are outside the compiler itself.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Mvapich is a High-Performance MPI Library for clusters with diverse
networks (InfiniBand, Omni-Path, Ethernet/iWARP, and RoCE) and computing
platforms (x86 (Intel and AMD), ARM and OpenPOWER)

dependencies.name: proj
dependencies.description:
PROJ is a generic coordinate transformation software, that transforms
geospatial coordinates from one coordinate reference system (CRS) to
another. This includes cartographic projections as well as geodetic
transformations.

dependencies.name: py-h5py
dependencies.description:
The h5py package provides both a high- and low-level interface to the
HDF5 library from Python.

dependencies.name: zfp
dependencies.description:
zfp is a compressed number format for multidimensional floating-point
and integer arrays. zfp provides compressed-array classes that support
high throughput read and write random access to individual array
elements. zfp also supports serial and parallel (OpenMP and CUDA)
compression of whole arrays.
